name: Résidence Kley
description:
Résidence Kley has a shared lounge, terrace, water sports facilities and tennis court in Marseille. Located around 1.1 km from Joliette Metro Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 1.3 km away from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. At Résidence Kley all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and windsurfing.

Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 1.2 km from Résidence Kley, while Vieux Port Metro station is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: La Terrasse du Saint James
description:
Located in Marseille, 2.3 km from Fausse Monnaie and 2.5 km from Plage de Maldorme, La Terrasse du Saint James offers air conditioning. Popular points of interest nearby include Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica, Castellane Metro Station and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The property is 1.5 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge. The accommodation offers a fireplace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Saint-Ferreol Street, Vieux Port Metro station and Palais du Pharo. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from La Terrasse du Saint James.

name: Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 21m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi, Staycity Aparthotels Marseille Centre Vieux Port offers air-conditioned accommodation in Marseille, only 550 metres from the port. Marseille Saint-Charles train station is a 12-minute walk away from the property.

All apartments and studios are accessible via a lift and feature a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a kitchenette fitted with a dishwasher, microwave, toaster, fridge, stovetop, coffee machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered.

Bars, shops and restaurants can be found within a 2-minute walk of the property.

The nearest metro station is only 44 metres from the property. Velodrome Stadium is 6.4 km from Staycity Aparthotels Marseille, while La Canebiere is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the property.

Some units come with a balcony.

name: LaFrenchCasa Canebière
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
LaFrenchCasa Canebière is set in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 500 metres from Vieux Port Metro station, 1.7 km from Joliette Metro Station and 1.9 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. This apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. The property is 2.3 km from Plage des Catalans, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

There is also a well-fitted kitchen in some of the units equipped with an oven, a microwave, and a toaster. At the apartment complex, the units include a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from LaFrenchCasa Canebière.

name: Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 23m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station, Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed features a sustainable 4-star accommodation in the Euromed - La Joliette district of Marseille. A hammam and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides a sauna, free WiFi throughout the property and family rooms.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is served for the buffet breakfast.

The aparthotel also offers a plunge pool and an indoor pool for guests to relax in.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is less than 1 km from Odalys City Marseille Centre Euromed, while Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: 3 NIGHTS MINIMUM, Renovated entire flat, city of Marseille, 4 people
description:
Renovated entire flat, city of Marseille, 4 people max, 3 night mini is set in Marseille, 1.4 km from La Timone Metro Station, 1.5 km from Saint-Ferreol Street, as well as 1.6 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is around 1.4 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 3.1 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 3.3 km from Joliette Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Castellane Metro Station.

The apartment includes 1 bedroom and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from Renovated entire flat, city of Marseille, 4 people max, 3 night mini.

name: Le Ryad Boutique Hôtel
description:
Le Ryad is located in the heart of Marseille, just 50 metres from La Canebiere and 1 km from the Old Port. It offers Moroccan-style rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access.

With a courtyard and an oriental garden, Le Ryad offers a range of uniquely decorated rooms, accessed through a staircase. Each is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

There is a tea salon open daily that serves mint tea, fruit juices and Moroccan pastries.

There are 2 breakfast options, a simple one and another one including fresh orange juice, fresh fruit salad, Moroccan crepe, yogurt, croissants, bread, butter, honey, jam and hot beverage.

Le Ryad is 300 metres from the Reformés Canebiere Metro Station, and 850 metres from the Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. Public parking is available 100 metres from the property.

name: Les Cocons - Appartements d'Hôtes Design
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 18m²
description:
Located 300 metres from the old harbour, Appartements d’Hôtes Design offers accommodations decorated in a design-style with parquet flooring. They all include a flat-screen TV and an equipped kitchen. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

The bathroom is fitted with a shower. After a long day of sightseeing, you can rest in the seating area of your air-conditioned accommodation.

The kitchen is equipped with a stove, a coffee machine and a dining area.  Restaurants and bars can be found right at the bottom of the building.

It is situated 1.4 km from Saint-Charles Train Station and 100 metres from Vieux-Port Hôtel de Ville Metro Station. There is a public car park at a location nearby.

name: Le Borély: Appartement climatisé avec 2 chambres, à 800m de la plage
description:
Located in Marseille, just less than 1 km from Bonneveine, Le Borély: Appartement climatisé avec 2 chambres, à 800m de la plage provides beachfront accommodation with a garden, a terrace and free WiFi. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.1 km from Plage de l'Huveaune. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Borely.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Orange Velodrome Stadium is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 28 km from Le Borély: Appartement climatisé avec 2 chambres, à 800m de la plage.

name: #LaFrenchCasa Belsunce
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 28m²
description:
#LaFrenchCasa Belsunce is set in the Vieux Port - La Canebière district of Marseille, 700 metres from Vieux Port Metro station, 1.5 km from Joliette Metro Station and 600 metres from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.5 km from Plage des Catalans.

The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, an oven, coffee machine, and a microwave. Some units feature a seating area and/or a terrace with an outdoor dining area. All units have a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Saint-Ferreol Street. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from #LaFrenchCasa Belsunce.

name: SUD PASSION - Sakakini - calme - 3 chambres - lumineux - fibre
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 3 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Located in Marseille, SUD PASSION - Sakakini - calme - 3 chambres - lumineux - fibre is a recently renovated accommodation, 1.1 km from La Timone Metro Station and 2.8 km from Castellane Metro Station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 3 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.6 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 3 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Marseille, like walking tours.

Saint-Ferreol Street is 3.6 km from SUD PASSION - Sakakini - calme - 3 chambres - lumineux - fibre, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: LE PANIER ENCHANTÉ - Suites & Loft - Terrasse et patio au dessus du Vieux Port
description_short: Private suite
description:
Set in the centre of Marseille, 2.8 km from Plage des Catalans, the historic LE PANIER ENCHANTÉ - Suites & Loft - Terrasse et patio au dessus du Vieux Port offers accommodation with free WiFi and a garden. With garden views, this accommodation provides a patio. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Units come with a kettle and a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some rooms also feature a fully equipped kitchen fitted with an oven. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Joliette Metro Station, Vieux Port Metro station and Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from LE PANIER ENCHANTÉ - Suites & Loft - Terrasse et patio au dessus du Vieux Port.

name: Europe Hotel Vieux Port
description:
Located just 20 metres from the Vieux Port, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. It is in central Marseille, 100 metres from La Canebière.

Each guest room at the Europe Hotel Vieux Port is soundproofed. The rooms also feature work desks, a courtesy tray with a kettle and hairdryers are provided in the bathrooms.

The Europe Hotel serves a buffet breakfast until midday, fee for children under 6 years old and the property's staff can assist with restaurant recommendations. Additional facilities include luggage storage and a free internet access.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just 130 metres from the Europe Vieux Port hotel and the Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Love room Jacuzzi Sauna Privatif Marseille
description_short: Private suite
description:
Love room Jacuzzi Sauna Privatif Marseille provides a sauna and a hot tub, as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in Marseille, 8.5 km from La Timone Metro Station. The accommodation features a spa bath and a hot tub. The apartment has facilities for disabled guests.

Featuring a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Castellane Metro Station is 9.2 km from the apartment, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 9.4 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from Love room Jacuzzi Sauna Privatif Marseille.

name: LaFrenchCasa Noailles
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 18m²
description:
LaFrenchCasa Noailles offers accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.2 km from Plage des Catalans. The apartment has private entrance.

At the apartment complex, the units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Vieux Port Metro station, Saint-Ferreol Street and Castellane Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from LaFrenchCasa Noailles.

name: Mercure Marseille Centre Vieux Port
description:
Mercure Marseille Centre Vieux Port is located next to the WTC convention centre and the Jardin des Vestiges, and is just a 5-minute walk from the Vieux-Port. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi access.

Rooms at the Mercure Marseille Centre are equipped with satellite and cable TV and a radio. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A full breakfast buffet is served every morning. Guests are invited to enjoy a drink and a light snack at the Marseille Centre’s bar, 1.13.

The Marseille Centre Mercure Hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Saint Charles TGV Train Station. It is easily accessible by the A7 motorway and a 25-minute drive from Marseille Provence Airport. Private parking is available at an extra cost.

name: Hôtel Hermès
description:
Hôtel Hermès is just 35 metres from the Vieux Port in central Marseilles. It offers a roof-top terrace with panoramic views of the harbour and the city, and free Wi-Fi.

Each guest room at the Hermès has a partial view of the Vieux Port. They are soundproofed and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and private bathrooms.

The hotel staff are available to assist you 24 hours a day. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning, served in the dining room.

The Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro Station is just a 3-minute walk from the Hermès hotel. The Saint Charles SNCF Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: CMG - Marseille / Opéra
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
In a central area of Marseille, located within a short distance of Vieux Port Metro station and Saint-Ferreol Street, CMG - Marseille / Opéra offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is situated 2.9 km from Fausse Monnaie, 2.1 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and 2.6 km from Palais du Pharo. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.1 km from Plage des Catalans.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Castellane Metro Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 22 km from CMG - Marseille / Opéra.

name: Residhotel Vieux Port
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 24m²
description:
Residhotel Vieux Port is located in Marseille's city centre, in front of the old port and a 15-minute walk from both the Mucem Museum and les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a private bathroom, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi.

Each spacious apartment has a kitchenette, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

A continental breakfast is available daily in the dining room. The reception is open every day from 07:30 to 12:30 and from 14:00 to 22:30.

Residhotel Vieux Port is in close proximity to the Palais de la Bourse and the Boulevard de la Canebière.

Vieux-Port Metro Station is just 200 metres from the property, and Saint-Charles train station is 1.3 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: The People - Marseille
description:
Attractively set in Marseille, The People - Marseille features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. Boasting a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Joliette Metro Station, a 12-minute walk from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre and less than 1 km from Vieux Port Metro station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Plage des Catalans.

The rooms have bed linen.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at the hostel.

Round-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Popular points of interest near The People - Marseille include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Saint-Ferreol Street. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port
description:
Hôtel Life Marseille VP - Vieux Port is set in an 18th-century stone building opposite the Vieux Port in Marseille's city centre. Recently renovated It offers panoramic harbour views and rooms with free WiFi. The property features a lift that runs from the first floor and staircase access to reception and the first floor.

Each guest room at Life is soundproofed, air conditioned and has a view of the harbour or the courtyard. There is a flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms are equipped with a bath or a shower and eco-friendly toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, served in the lobby. The staff at Life are available to assist you 24 hours a day.

The lobby is also a place where you can meet other guests staying at the hotel.

Life Hotel is 100 metres from the Vieux-Port Metro Station and Marseille's main road, La Canebière. The Saint Charles SNCF Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: LoveNest Marseille
description:
LoveNest Marseille is a sustainable bed and breakfast in Marseille, where guests can make the most of its spa and wellness centre and bar. This bed and breakfast provides free private parking and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can access the bed and breakfast via private entrance.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fridge, a coffee machine, a hot tub, bathrobes and a wardrobe. There is also a dressing room and a seating area. All units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

La Timone Metro Station is 6.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Orange Velodrome Stadium is 6.9 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 31 km from LoveNest Marseille.

name: Beauregard - Au coeur du Panier proche Vieux-Port
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 21m²
description:
In the Le Panier district of Marseille, close to Joliette Metro Station, Beauregard - Au coeur du Panier proche Vieux-Port features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property has city views and is 800 metres from Vieux Port Metro station and 1.2 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. The property is 2.1 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

The kitchen comes with a microwave, a toaster and a fridge and there is a private bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations, Saint-Ferreol Street and Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from Beauregard - Au coeur du Panier proche Vieux-Port.

name: DANIEL
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 25m²
description:
DANIEL features accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Marseille, with free WiFi, and a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.2 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 1.9 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and 1.8 km from Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica. Plage des Catalans is 2.2 km from the apartment and La Timone Metro Station is 2.5 km away.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with a coffee machine. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near DANIEL include Saint-Ferreol Street, Castellane Metro Station and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 18m²
description:
Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer is located in a residential district, 750 metres from the Palais des Congrès and 1 km from the Velodrome Stadium. This aparthotel offers an indoor swimming pool. Perier Metro Station is just 150 metres away and WiFi access is free.

A fully-equipped kitchen equipped with hotplates is a standard facility in the accommodation at Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer. All studios and apartments have an LCD TV and some have a separate bedroom.

A buffet breakfast of French viennoiseries is served every morning in Aparthotel Adagio Access Marseille Prado Périer 's breakfast room. Children from 4 to 11 years old can enjoy it at a reduced rate. There are drinks and snacks vending machines in the 24-hour reception, which also has luggage storage.

The property can be accessed from the A50, a 5-minute drive away. Guests can enjoy the beach 4 km away. Marseille Old Port is 3 km away and Parc Chanot is an 8-minute walk from this residence. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Golden Tulip Villa Massalia
description:
A 7-minute walk from the beach, Golden Tulip Villa Massalia is 3.5 km from Velodrome Stadium and 6 km from Les Goudes. It offers luxury accommodation with an outdoor pool open in the season and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned rooms offer a flat-screen TV and a safe. Deluxe rooms feature a balcony or terrace with panoramic sea views. The bathrooms have a hairdryer, toiletries, bath robes and slippers. A bottle of water is offered upon arrival.

Golden Tulip Villa Massalia's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. During fine weather guests can dine on the terrace overlooking the racecourse. The hotel bar is open every day and serves cocktails and snacks.

Marseilles city centre is 5 km away. Villa Massalia can be accessed from the airport, a 35-minute drive away or Gare Saint Charles, a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Charmant studio proche de la timone
description:
Charmant studio proche de la timone is located in the Baille-La Timone district of Marseille, 600 metres from La Timone Metro Station, 2.1 km from Castellane Metro Station and 3.1 km from Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre. The property is around 3.2 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station, 3.2 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 3.3 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium. Joliette Metro Station is 4.4 km from the apartment and Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica is 4.5 km away.

The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Vieux Port Metro station is 3.4 km from Charmant studio proche de la timone, while Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 18m²
description:

This recently renovated apartment is located 2 km from Plage des Catalans and 400 metres from Vieux Port Metro station. The apartment has family rooms.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Joliette Metro Station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 23 km from ADIRA Résid'Marseille Vieux-port.

description:

The property features city views and is 1.3 km from Joliette Metro Station and 1.5 km from Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, certain units at the apartment complex also have a terrace.

description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 75m²
description:

This sustainable apartment is located 1.1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 1.6 km from Vieux Port Metro station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Joliette Metro Station is less than 1 km away.

The 3-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

name: MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette
description:
Located in Marseille and with Joliette Metro Station reachable within 400 metres, MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette provides a tour desk, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is set 1 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station, 2.4 km from Saint-Ferreol Street and 3.4 km from Palais du Pharo. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near MEININGER Marseille Centre la Joliette include Les Terrasses du Port Shopping Centre, Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations and Vieux Port Metro station. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

description:
Located in Marseille, 1.4 km from La Timone Metro Station and 1.6 km from Castellane Metro Station, Le Calanque - Centre-Ville - Proche gare offers air conditioning. The property is set 1.6 km from Vieux Port Metro station, 1.4 km from Marseille Saint-Charles Train Station and 3 km from Museum of European and Mediterranean Civilisations. With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

name: PARADISE Earth & Sea
description:
Surrounded by views of the city, PARADISE Earth & Sea is a sustainable aparthotel in Marseille, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Vieux Port Metro station. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. The property is 2 km from Plage des Catalans, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, coffee machine, and a fridge. description:
Located on Marseille Vieux Port, Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is an eco-friendly hotel offering views of the Notre-Dame de la Garde, Saint Jean Fort and Pharo Garden. Set in a typical Marseillaise building, it has a cocktail bar and an wrought-iron central staircase dating from 1900. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room at the Hotel Belle-Vue is also equipped with air-conditioning and a flat-screen satellite TV, and most have large windows with views of the port. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer and either a shower or a bathtub. Ironing facilities are available.

A continental breakfast is provided daily and can be enjoyed in the guest rooms. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine from the south of France. La Caravelle cocktail bar has a balcony where guests can enjoy a drink.

The 24-hour reception offers local tourist information and newspapers are available every morning.

Hotel Belle-Vue Vieux-Port is just 250 metres from the Vieux-Port Hotel de Ville Metro station, which provides direct access to the Saint Charles Train Station.

name: T2 a 10 mn des facs de Luminy et des calanques vue panoramique
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 37m²
description:
Located in Marseille, 4 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium and 4.2 km from Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station, T2 a 10 mn des facs de Luminy et des calanques vue panoramique offers air conditioning. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are available at the apartment free of charge. The property is soundproof and is set 4.6 km from Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre.

The apartment with a balcony and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

A continental breakfast is available daily at T2 a 10 mn des facs de Luminy et des calanques vue panoramique.

Castellane Metro Station is 6.1 km from the accommodation, while La Timone Metro Station is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 30 km from T2 a 10 mn des facs de Luminy et des calanques vue panoramique.

name: Sofitel Marseille Vieux-Port
description:
Boasting free access to a spa, sauna and hammam, Sofitel Marseille Vieux-Port also features 3 terraces overlooking Marseille's Old Port. Some air-conditioned guest rooms have a terrace with harbour views.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and an iPod docking station are featured in the guest rooms at the Sofitel Marseille Vieux-Port. Each elegant room includes a minibar. Some of the stylish bathrooms include a TV.

Les Trois Forts restaurant serves gourmet cuisine, accompanied by fine wines and champagnes. It offers panoramic views of the harbour. There is also a brasserie 'Carré Bistromanie' which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner with pastries available to buy in between. Guests can buy cocktails in the Dantès Skylounge bar.

Guests can access the fitness room 24 hours a day free of charge.

Private underground parking is available on site and garages are available on request. Catalans Beach is 500 metres from the hotel. The Château d’If is accessible by ferry from the nearby marina.

name: ibis Marseille Centre Euromed
description:
Just 2 km from the Old Port, Hôtel ibis Marseille Euroméditerranée offers modern accommodation with a 24-hour reception, free newspapers and free WiFi. It also has a restaurant, a bar and a terrace.

The air-conditioned hotel’s rooms feature a TV with satellite and cable channels. They all have an en suite bathroom with hairdryer and shower.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Guests can dine at the hotel’s à-la-carte restaurant or enjoy a drink on the terrace’s bar.

Bus lines, a metro station and a tram stop can be found within 400 metres of the property and allow guests to easily access Saint-Charles train station, the city centre and the Old Port. Parc Chanot Exhibition Centre and the Catalans Beaches are 4 km away, while Notre-Dame de la Garde is 3.5 km away. Underground public parking is available nearby at a discounted cost.

Marseille-Marignane Airport is 23 km away.

Our hotel is getting a makeover for your future well-being. We will welcome you in the best possible conditions and everything is done to ensure your peace of mind. We are ready and eager to welcome you!

From March 27, 2023, we will start work on the ground floor.
Work that may cause noise pollution will be carried out between 10 a.m. and 5 p.m.
